Head Quarters 12th Ky Infty Vols
Strawberry Plains E Tenn
January 10th 1864
To his excellency. Thomas E Bramlette
Govr of Kentucky
Honorable Sir

I have the pleasure of reporting to you that the 12th Ky. I. v. have Reenlisted as Veteran Vols under the provisions of orders 191' from war Dept and will march from here on our way to Ky between now and the 1st of February. the date of the reenlistment of the Regt in the Veteran Service will date from the 24th of December 1863, They have reenlisted under the promise that the Regt will be mounted. I would prefer to make them Cavalry. The order authorizing the Reenlistment of the Regt as mounted men came from Genl Foster Comdg Dept of the Ohio

I have the honor to be
Very Respectfully.
Your Obt Sevt
L H Rousseau
Lt Col Comdg Regt

12
Hd qrs. 12t Ky Inft Vols.
Strawbeery Plains E. Tenn
10th Jany 1864
Rousseau L. H
Lt Col. Comd
Has the honor to report that the 12th Regt Ky Inft has reenlisted as veterans under provisions of order 191 from War Department
